cont.entity_a: Great sound quality with separate acoustics and crisp bass. Versatile for music, movies, and gaming with clear sound across all frequencies.
cont.entity_b: Decent highs and mids, but weak bass. Sound quality is good but overshadowed by poor durability. Not suitable for high bass output; distorts at max volume.

cont.entity_a: Large ear cups and soft padding.
cont.entity_b: Can cause discomfort after prolonged use.

cont.entity_a: Durable with some plastic cracking over time, but still functional.
cont.entity_b: Subpar build quality with weak plastic prone to breaking. Sound quality is good but overshadowed by poor durability.

cont.entity_a: Long cable, sometimes cumbersome but allows movement.
Not suitable for public use due to sound leakage.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for high bass output; distorts at max volume.

cont.entity_a: Excellent value for money, especially for long-term use.
Open design allows ambient sound to be heard, not ideal for noise isolation.
Requires an adapter for 3.5mm devices, which is included.
